nodes.text: Balka greens were a species of plant which grew on Arbra during the time of the Arbran civilization. In the library of Grotto City, C-3PO found an Arbran cookbook with a recipe requiring balka greens. Balka greens were among the vegetables that Russo Berlihat was instructed to feed to Moff Bandor's captive Protean; however, Berlihat himself was actually intended to be eaten by the shapeshifter.
